item.title: Nginx - notes
item.description: Main commands [sudo] nginx -s signal (while an nginx instance is running) Signal Action stop fast shutdown quit graceful shutdown (waits for workers) reload reload the configuration file reopen reopen the log files test nginx configuration changes # nginx -t the configuration file /usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.conf syntax is ok configuration file /usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.conf test is successful Configuration files # nginx server configuration directory /usr/local/nginx/conf/ /etc/nginx/ # main configuration file /usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.
